chat.speaker: Alex
chat.message: You’ve pushed me for the last time. Keep it up and you’re going to find out exactly why nobody crosses me twice.

chat.speaker: Jordan
chat.message: Oh I’m shaking. You talk big but all I see is someone desperate to look tough.

chat.speaker: Alex
chat.message: Say whatever you want. You’re about to learn that I don’t back down.

chat.speaker: Jordan
chat.message: Good. I’d hate for you to run when things get messy. Let’s see if you can handle what you started.
